snippet: The former head of the Chinese national soccer association and 10 former national team players and executives were sentenced Wednesday for accepting bribes and fixing matches.
abstract: Chinese courts sentence the former head of the Chinese soccer association and 10 other former national team players and executives to lengthy prison terms for accepting bribes and fixing matches.
lead_paragraph: The former head of the Chinese national soccer association and 10 former national team players and executives were sentenced Wednesday for accepting bribes and fixing matches.

headline.seo: Chinese Soccer Officials Get Prison in Corruption Case
